400015000.Original_Text: (잠깐, 저기 저 녀석들은\n새총을 들고 있는 것 같은데?)
400015000.English_Text:
(Wait, those guys over there look
with slingshots?)
400015000.Chinese_Text:
(等等,那边的那些家伙好像拿着
弹弓?)

400015001.English_Text: (This <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> has been completely occupied by the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Westerns</> )
400015001.Chinese_Text:
(这个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>采伐区</>是
完全被<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>西方人</>占领)

400015002.Chinese_Text: (好吧!这次探索的目标是湖边</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>盗贼</>!)

400015003.English_Text:
(The shell is really hard.
Shall we go to the lake over there?)
400015003.Chinese_Text:
(贝壳真的很硬.
我们去那边的湖吗?)

400015004.English_Text:
(Ouch, that's a surprise! 
The thing that pops up out of the blue is 
I just can't get used to it)
400015004.Chinese_Text:
(我很惊讶!
它弹出的原因是因为
我不习惯它)

400015005.English_Text:
(Oh, there are a lot of
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>turtles</> in this lake!)

400015006.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Holidays</> in a place like this...
This expedition is
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> I like the Runaway Guard</>)
400015006.Chinese_Text:
(在这种地方,<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>遗迹</>是…… 
探索的目标是
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>逃兵</>)

400015007.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>회랑</> 안에 있던 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수호병</>과 \n같아 보이는데... \n왜 폭주하게 된 걸까?)
400015007.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Looks like the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Guardians</> in the cloister</>
... 
Why did you run into a runaway?)
400015007.Chinese_Text:
(和<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>走廊</>里的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>守卫</>长得一模一样……
他为什么会撞上逃跑者?)

400015008.English_Text:
(This is the base of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Fighters</>.
Let's explore the area)
400015008.Chinese_Text:
(这里是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>战队</>的据点.
探索周边)

400015009.Original_Text: (...이렇게 세력이 강했다니.\n무자비한 밀렵을 막기 위한\n대책 강구가 필요하겠어)
400015009.English_Text:
(...to have such a strong force.
To prevent ruthless poaching
We need to take measures)
400015009.Chinese_Text:
(……拥有如此强大的力量.
必须采取措施防止无情的偷猎.)

400015010.English_Text:
(Oh my God! 
There are so many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tigers</>?
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Forest road</> Let's explore)
400015010.Chinese_Text:
(天啊!这么多的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>老虎</>?一起来探索
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>森林小径</>)

400015011.English_Text:
(Ooh, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Arbor Spirit</>
Your area is clear.
Let's go somewhere else now)
400015011.Chinese_Text:
(哦,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>树灵</>
有空旷的地方,我们去别的地方吧.)

400015012.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The spear gang</>'s lair 
It must have been hidden here! 
Let's start exploring)
400015012.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>长道丹</>的巢穴 
一定藏在这里!
开始探索吧)

400015013.English_Text:
(That's a threat. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Halfmoon Lake</> would be a great threat to 
the security of the lake)
400015013.Chinese_Text:
(有威胁.<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>汪达尔湖</> 
对公共安全有很大威胁)

400015014.English_Text:
(It's near a cemetery...
It's spooky.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spiders</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Examine the wolf</>)
400015014.Chinese_Text:
(大概是因为离墓地比较近吧……
感觉怪怪的.先调查一下
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>和<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>狼</>)

400015016.English_Text:
(It looks like they are wild and aggressive, 
born from a grudge 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Goblin</>...)
400015016.Chinese_Text:
(看他们凶猛好斗,似乎是
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>哥布林</>怀恨在心……)

400015017.Chinese_Text:
(哦,<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Parbali</>Ro-gun!
好吧,这个探索目标是
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>草</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Parbali</>)

400015018.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>干三明亭</>不留
的阴凉处)

400015019.English_Text:
(Uhm? <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Isn't this a brocade</>?
What are you doing here?)
400015019.Chinese_Text:
(嗯?是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>二叶</>吧?
你在这里做什么?)

400015020.English_Text:
(Wow, that's a really huge <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bear</>.
Okay, this expedition is
in the hilly area. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bear</>!)
400015020.Chinese_Text:
(哇,好大的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>熊</>.
好吧,这次探索的目标是丘陵地带的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>熊</>!)

400015021.English_Text:
(It's also <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</>.
It's as strong as <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bear</> uh)
400015021.Chinese_Text:
(毕竟是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>老虎</>.
实力不会落后<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>熊</>)

400015022.English_Text:
(Hmm. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Fighters</> have reached this far
poaching hand)
400015022.Chinese_Text:
(嗯.<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>斗士</>已经伸手
偷猎了)

400015023.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Are you from the Westerners</>?
Something is a bit strange
Let's take a closer look)
400015023.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>这不是徐仁</>吗?
有什么奇怪的吗?
让我们仔细看看)

400015024.English_Text:
(Everyone has lost their ego.
And besides, they are 
much stronger than before...)
400015024.Chinese_Text:
(每个人都失去了自我.
此外,他们
比以前强大了很多......)

400015025.English_Text:
(...all over <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn-ahead</> Heaven and Earth.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn-ahead</> Let's investigate)

400015026.Original_Text: (끝도 없이 쏟아져 나오는군.\n균열 안에는 도대체\n어떤 공간이 있는걸까...)
400015026.English_Text:
(It's pouring out endlessly.
What kind of space is there in the crack...)
400015026.Chinese_Text:
(不断地倾泻而出.
裂缝
里有什么样的空间?)

400015027.English_Text:
(After this, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Half Moon Lake</> seems to have all been 
examined)
400015027.Chinese_Text:
(这个地方的尽头,<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>汪达尔湖</>好像都看过
)

400015028.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Thieves</> bastards, 
You stole a lot of this and that!
Oh, there <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>There are hermit crabs</>?)
400015028.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>贼贼</>伙计们,
他们偷了很多这个那个!
哦~还有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>寄居蟹</>也?)

400015029.English_Text:
(The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Lake Turtle</>'s 
Movement is very fast than I thought?)
400015029.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>湖龟</>
的动作比你想象的要快?)

400015030.English_Text:
(Hmm? That <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Runaway Guard</>
looks like a different weapon)
400015030.Chinese_Text:
(嗯?那个<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Runaway Guard </>有
不同的武器)

400015031.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검사, 암살자</>에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>궁사</>까지...\n제법 구색을 갖췄군.\n좀 더 살펴볼 필요가 있겠어)
400015031.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>swordsman, assassin</> to <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>archer</>...
really You have an assortment.
I need to look into it a bit more)
400015031.Chinese_Text:
(从<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>剑士、刺客</>到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>弓箭手</>……
你的搭配很不错.

400015032.English_Text:
(These are really vicious guys.
They will be a threat to the residents)
400015032.Chinese_Text:
(他们真的很凶.
他们会对居民构成威胁)

400015033.Original_Text: (제법 훈련된 모습이야.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>궁사</>는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>호랑이</>와 함께\n다니는 것 같으니 조심하자)
400015033.English_Text:
(He looks very trained.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Archer</> is a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</> It looks like we're walking together, so be careful)
400015033.Chinese_Text:
(看来是受过不少训练啊,
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>弓箭手</>好像是和<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>老虎</>一起走的,小心点)

400015034.English_Text:
(A <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spider</> so big!
Worse than <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Wolf</> .
Let's go further inside)
400015034.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>这么大!比<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>狼</>还可怕.
往里面走.)

400015035.Original_Text: (...어떻게 보면\n귀여운 것 같기도 하고...\n저 옆쪽 언덕도 살펴보자)
400015035.English_Text:
(...in a way,
it looks cute...
Let's take a look at the hill next to it)
400015035.Chinese_Text:
(……某种程度上
看起来很可爱……
让我们看看旁边的小山)

400015036.English_Text:
(You are really strong. 
 Among <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tiger</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bear</>. nWho wants to be stronger?)
400015036.Chinese_Text:
(你真的很强.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>老虎</>和<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>熊</>,你觉得谁更强?)

400015037.English_Text: (Oh! It looks like it's been eroded by the energy of the rift!)
400015037.Chinese_Text: (天哪!我想我被裂缝的能量侵蚀了!)

400015038.Chinese_Text:
(剑真的很硬.
用另一把武器<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>一旦你烧了</>也
让我们仔细看看)
